com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.reflection.chain

Interface FieldLink

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FieldLinkImpl

    public interface FieldLink
    Represents a field link in the ReflectionChain
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    AgentTroll

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  FieldLink.Getter
      The field getter access
      static interface  FieldLink.Setter
      The field setter access

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FieldLink field(String name)
      Sets the field accessor for the field name provided
      FieldLink fieldFuzzy(Class<?> type, int index)
      Sets the field accessor using "fuzzy" search
      FieldManager<?,?> getManager()
      Gets the manager used to perform the reflective actions
      FieldLink.Getter getter()
      Acquires the manager to acquire the field value from
      FieldLink instance(Object instance)
      Uses an instance acquired from the user to perform reflective operations
      FieldLink last(int index)
      Uses an instance acquired from a different reflective operation to use as the instance to perform operations on the field.
      FieldLink.Setter setter()
      Acquires the manager to push the value of the field to

    • Method Detail

      • last

        FieldLink last(int index)
        Uses an instance acquired from a different reflective operation to use as the instance to perform operations on the field.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the returned value from an earlier reflective operation
        Returns:
        the instance it was set to

      • instance

        FieldLink instance(Object instance)
        Uses an instance acquired from the user to perform reflective operations
        Parameters:
        instance - the Object instance to use
        Returns:
        the instance it was set to

      • getter

        FieldLink.Getter getter()
        Acquires the manager to acquire the field value from
        Returns:
        the getter of the field

      • setter

        FieldLink.Setter setter()
        Acquires the manager to push the value of the field to
        Returns:
        the setter of the field

      • field

        FieldLink field(String name)
        Sets the field accessor for the field name provided
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the field to be accessed
        Returns:
        the instance it was set to

      • fieldFuzzy

        FieldLink fieldFuzzy(Class<?> type,
                     int index)
        Sets the field accessor using "fuzzy" search
        Parameters:
        type - the type the field represents
        index - the index to use from a List of fields following the criteria
        Returns:
        the instance it was set to

      • getManager

        FieldManager<?,?> getManager()
        Gets the manager used to perform the reflective actions
        Returns:
        the internal manager
